title: Complaint against unfair discrimination; reporting requirements
context: ยง489-6 Complaint against unfair discrimination; reporting requirements. The civil rights commission shall receive complaints of unfair discriminatory treatment in public accommodations in accordance with the procedures established under chapter 368; provided that this section shall not apply to complaints under part II of this chapter. [L 1986, c 292, pt of ยง1; am L 1989, c 386, ยง11; am L 2000, c 227, ยง4]
